title: Video Player
description:
Video Player is a powerful media player, which support almost all video file formats, For Free!
The Media Player is not only a video player but also a music player. It plays most local video and audio files, has a media library for audio and video files, and allows to browse folders directly.
Features :
- Automatic identification of all the video and audio files in the phone.
- Quick browser your video folder.
- Thumbnail display the contents of the video file
- Recent playlist
- Supports multi-core decoding.
- Mutiple subtitle tracks support.
- Pause the music when someone is calling.
If you are looking for a better video player, we ensure that after download and use it, you will love this video player.
